amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 915, relating to manufactured housing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 200 printed in House Report 115-297 to strike section 915 on page 563, relating to manufactured housing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A164) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 245 (Roll no. 522).
